A breath of fresh air, right where you want to be
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 609 Sq.
Bowman is North Seattle's newest apartment community.
Bowman evokes inspired Stone Way living.
Kick off your shoes and take in the views!
Located right in Wallingford, where many of the city's most creative-minded restaurants and shops have made a home.
Easy on the eyes, and on the lifestyle.
Bowman homes are relaxed modern, with splashes of serene color that add an infusion of warmth.
Situated in Seattle's next destination district, Bowman is a sophisticated invitation to a chill lakeside vibe.
